com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk

Class PHNotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.PHNotificationManager

  • public abstract class PHNotificationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages notifications from hue SDK to the applications.

      • getDefaultManager

        public static PHNotificationManager getDefaultManager()
        Returns PHNotificationManager instance for SDK notifications.
        Parameters:
        handler - the Handler object for notifying to UI thread from background process.
        Returns:
        the PHNotificationManager object.

      • registerSDKListener

        public abstract void registerSDKListener(PHSDKListener listener)
        Register a hue SDK listener object to listen to notifications related to local connection.
        Parameters:
        listener - the PHSDKListener interface.

      • unregisterSDKListener

        public abstract void unregisterSDKListener(PHSDKListener listener)
        Unregister a hue SDK listener object.
        Parameters:
        listener - the PHSDKListener listener interface

      • cancelSearchNotification

        public abstract void cancelSearchNotification()
        Stops light search notifications. It is used for canceling the find new lights search operation.
